Text saved: Terrie Sharp is a writer. She sells many books. She knows how to tell good stories. She won an important award for crime writers two times.

She was born in Glasgow. She lived in a place with a lot of crime. When she was a child, she learned to be quiet. She learned to not get into trouble. She also learned how to open car doors with a knife.

But she was lucky. She only uses this information for her books. Now, she is not quiet. She is on popular TV shows like 'Police Today'. She also goes to big meetings for writers in the UK.
